attributes.action: Increase Large Goods Vehcile Speed limit on single carriageway
attributes.additional_details:
Increase the speed limit for Large Goods Vehicles (LGV) from 40mph to 50mph on Single carriageways to prevent other drivers/riders from becoming impatient and talking chances when overtaking.
Other benifits: Better traffic flow, shorter deliver times, higher gears can be used to reduce carbon footprint.
